body:
I suspect that this problem is caused by #4852 (specifically, I understand that `long` is 32 bits on Windows).

As a side note, would you mind telling me how you got the package to build on Windows? I have not yet managed to do that.
gRPC has been updated to work on Windows, so you can now just install it with `npm install grpc` without any modification. I believe that other changes I made should fix this problem. Can you check?
@murgatroid99 Thanks. I think it has been fixed. Using grpc through npm is really cool. :)
Good. I'll close it for now. We can reopen if this comes up again.
